experience: 4+ years of experience in mobile application development using Flutter and Dart.
Built and published apps on both iOS and Android platforms using a single codebase.
Integrated third-party APIs such as Google Maps, Firebase Authentication, and Stripe payments.
Experienced in writing clean, maintainable code and following MVVM architecture patterns.
jobDescription: We are seeking a skilled Mobile App Developer to join our fast-growing team. The ideal candidate will have strong experience building cross-platform mobile applications and a passion for user-friendly design.
